reviewText: I think that it is a story that reaches out to everyone. Amitabh Bachchans dual role was handled with special care to make it believable. A Father makes a fast decision that leaves his family and relationships in a bad light. Which later has to be corrected by acceptance of the son and  Father.

Very disappointed with this movie!!!
Won't recommend to any one.
I want my money back, please.
Had good review, but I am missing something, I guess!!!

Acharya Bharat
Padminilight.com
